title: Why am I in low priority queue?
body: So I just finished a game and at the end I got a message saying I have been put in low priority queue. so I looked it up and it says its for people who leave too many games. I have only even left one game and that was months ago because I had to go out so I'm wondering what has happened and how i fix it? Any body else have this issue? Could it be because I leave custom games? I thought you could because there were not other human players.

replies.body: Same I left 1 game after 20+ games of not leaving and then i get low priority 20 mins
Do you disconnect from games because of lag?
